parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name for which you want to create a backup task.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language in which you want the values of some response parameters to be returned. These response parameters support multiple languages.

parameters.name: PeriodType
parameters.description:
The backup cycle. Valid values:

*   **DAY**: Backs up data once every day.
*   **HOUR**: Backs up data once every hour.
